weekly_top_story.headline: Russia launches new missile and drone attack on Ukraine
weekly_top_story.summary: Russia fired 25 missiles and 219 drones at Ukraine overnight, with most intercepted, escalating the ongoing conflict and straining international aid efforts as allies pledge billions in military support.

stories.headline: UK court says government acted illegally in outlawing protest group Palestine Action
stories.summary: Britain’s High Court ruled the government’s ban on Palestine Action as a terrorist group unlawful, highlighting tensions between security measures and civil liberties amid pro-Palestine protests.

stories.headline: Logistics giant DP World replaces chairman named in Jeffrey Epstein documents
stories.summary: Dubai appointed a new chairman for DP World, replacing one linked to Jeffrey Epstein files, signaling efforts to distance a major global logistics firm from scandal amid heightened scrutiny.
